definition: to sum up/a roundup/a general narrative
heddle (device to form warp in weaving textiles)/Taiwan pr. [zong4]
to sum up/to put together/Taiwan pr. [zong4]

sentences.english: The research progress of osteogenetic effects of OGP is reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章对OGP促成骨作用的研究进展进行综述。

sentences.english: In this paper, the newest developing of plastic optical fiber is reviewed for various communication.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了各种通信用塑料光纤研究的最新进展。

sentences.english: The paper briefly describes present state of airborne laser reconnaissance subaquatic targets technology at abroad.
sentences.chinese: 综述了国外机载激光侦察水下目标技术的发展现状。

sentences.english: The author review the research progress in the reattachment of fractured tooth.
sentences.chinese: 本文对断牙再接的研究进展作一综述。

sentences.english: The advances in the process technology for the enzymatic synthesis of cephalexin are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了酶法合成头孢氨苄的工艺方法研究进展。

sentences.english: Totally 99 repeated articles were deleted and 22 were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 排除99篇重复文献，纳入22篇用于综述。

sentences.english: Reburning process for flue gas denitrification and its main affecting factors are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 综述了再燃法烟气脱硝技术及其主要影响因素。

sentences.english: In this article, the research progress of integron in gram-positive bacter…
sentences.chinese: 本文就革兰阳性菌中整合子的研究进展做一综述。

sentences.english: This is the brief summary about the recent study progress on the secretion proteins of Mycobacteria .
sentences.chinese: 对近年来分支杆菌分泌蛋白研究进展进行了简要综述。

sentences.english: Characters and applications of xanthine oxidase of cow milk were described.
sentences.chinese: 综述了牛乳中黄嘌呤氧化酶的各种性质及其应用。

sentences.english: This is a view on the chemical composition and Pharmacological Function of Colla Corii Asini.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了中药阿胶的化学成分及其药理药效作用。

sentences.english: This paper presents an overview of recent advances in the studies of two-compartment PDF.
sentences.chinese: 文中就近年来双室双袋PDF的研究进展作一综述。

sentences.english: A application of bioconversion of cellulose in production of feed and fertilizer was reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 综述了纤维素生物转化在农业饲料和肥料中的应用。

sentences.english: Objective To review the recent studies on health evaluation indicator systems.
sentences.chinese: 目的对近年来国内外卫生指标体系的研究进行综述。

sentences.english: The prevention and control of edema disease of swine were reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文对猪水肿病的发病机制及防治措施进行了综述。

sentences.english: Objective To review the studies on the chemical constituents and biological activities of the fruits of Cnidium monnieri.
sentences.chinese: 目的对中药蛇床子的化学成分和生物活性作一综述。

definition: to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
(after completing a game of chess) to replay the game, analyzing the players' moves/(stock market) to resume trading
